title: Early Warning Systems for Institutional Capture
description: Research metrics and monitoring systems that can detect early signs of institutional capture, regulatory capture, and systemic corruption before they become entrenched.
source_document: Outcome Measurement Framework_ Democratic Institutional Health Metrics.pdf

key_sources.title: Regulatory agency personnel and decision records
key_sources.why: Direct evidence of regulatory decision patterns

key_sources.title: Financial disclosure and lobbying registration databases
key_sources.why: Verifiable financial connections between regulators and regulated

key_sources.title: Academic studies on regulatory capture patterns

expected_outcomes: Create financial and personnel indicators for institutional capture detection
Develop revolving door pattern quantification and monitoring systems
Design policy outcome metrics indicating regulatory capture
Implement network analysis for detecting influence operations
research_questions: What financial and personnel indicators signal institutional capture?
How can revolving door patterns be quantified and monitored?
What policy outcome metrics indicate regulatory capture?
How can network analysis detect influence operations?
